snippet: Professor Dahl, who taught at Yale for 40 years, was a political scientist who was widely regarded as his profession’s most distinguished student of democratic government.
abstract: Professor Robert A Dahl, political scientist who taught at Yale for 40 years and who was widely regarded as his profession's most distinguished student of democratic government, dies at age 98.
lead_paragraph: Professor Dahl, who taught at Yale for 40 years, was a political scientist who was widely regarded as his profession’s most distinguished student of democratic government.

headline.main: Robert A. Dahl Dies at 98; Yale Scholar Defined Politics and Power
headline.print_headline: Robert A. Dahl Dies at 98; Defined Politics and Power
